Text: had to put a .divx extension on it to make it play, what is .mkv?  Seemed to jitter a bit durrung fast motion. Thanks for ul.

"Matroska is similar in conception to other containers like AVI, MP4 or ASF, but is completely open source. Matroska file types are .MKV for video (and audio) and .MKA for audio-only files."
And the jitter may occur due to hardware issues.

if you've got a beefy enough computer for HD quality, I'd recommend runs very well for me.  Oh, and if all else fails, use VLC player.  Works like a charm on most Hi Def video

Thanks uploader!!!!
